SectionBody.Text: For the purpose of allowing credit to licensed distributors of malt beverages or beer for keeping prescribed records, furnishing bond, and properly accounting for and remitting taxes due to the state, such licensed distributors shall be allowed 2.5 percent of the amount of the tax due, accounted for, and remitted to the division, in the form of a deduction from such remittance. However, no allowance may be granted or permitted when the tax is delinquent at the time of payment.
